item.title: Breaking Monoliths for Business Velocity
item.description: Preface # The technological benefits of Monoliths is a widely covered topic in the technology community, however, the benefits for an organisation/business are less discussed.

item.title: Percentage Based Routing in High Performance Distributed Systems
item.description: Introduction # In today’s dynamic digital landscape, efficient request routing is paramount for ensuring optimal performance and user experience.

item.title: 308: The Permanent Redirect to Your Next Software Job
item.description: Introduction # It is important to note that the content of this blog post primarily pertains to the UK, and more specifically, the London job market.
